SELECT MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_CODE , IS_ADMIN FROM studyroom_member
WHERE ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY MEMBER_CODE DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_GENDER , MEMBER_TEL , POST_CODE , MEMBER_ADDR , ADDR_DETAIL , IS_ADMIN , DATE_FORMAT(MEMBER_BIRTH, '%Y/%m/%d') MEMBER_BIRTH FROM STUDYROOM_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}

SELECT SEAT_NUM , SEAT_POWER , SEAT_FLOOR , AGE_CODE , SEAT.MEMBER_CODE FROM STUDYROOM_SEAT SEAT INNER JOIN STUDYROOM_MEMBER MEMBER ON SEAT.MEMBER_CODE = MEMBER.MEMBER_CODE WHERE SEAT.MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}
